item.description: [b]Sorry, somn came up.[/b] Runtime: ~2hrs | Rated PG intense adventure action and some scary moments. Description: A science professor's (Brendan Fraser) untraditional hypotheses have made him the laughing stock of the academic community. But on an expedition in Iceland, he and his nephew (Josh Hutcherson) stumble upon a major discovery that launches them on a thrilling journey deep beneath the Earth?s surface, where they travel through never-before-seen worlds and encounter a variety of unusual creatures. Director: Brendan Fraser, Josh Hutcherson, Anita Briem Starring: Eric Brevig Genre: Fantasy Adventure, Prehistoric Fantasy, Adventure, Fantasy Reviews: http://www.boston.com/movies/display?display=movie&id=9140 Trailer: Notes: Please do not RSVP YES if you do not intend to come. Yes is not a MAYBE. If you can't figure out what you are going to do in the future, please do not burden us with that. Please buy your tix [b]AHEAD[/b] of time! I'm going to watch this regardless of people coming, but it will more fun with people. How to find me: I"ll be wearing my trademark green hat+Meetup logo+my screename JediFonger in front as usual. If it's upstairs, I'll be in front of the coffee house next to the windows, near the metal seat+tables. If it's downstairs, I'll be in front of the popcorn stand behind the rope. I'll be there @7:45PM. We will go into the auditorium@8PM. The movie begins@8:10PM. Don't forget your 3-D GLASSES when you get the ticket!
item.how_to_find_us: I"ll be wearing my trademark green trucker hat w/my screename JediFonger+meetup
item.why: Because we are the coolest cats on the planet.
item.name: Journey to the Center of the Earth !3-D!
